column5: I want to take the opportunity to thank all of the amazing sponsors that helped us out for the Fish-A-Thon this year.  The word EPIC comes to mind when I look at the long list. We will make some special thanks to certain companies and people when we do up a full report. I have added a link to each company, simply click the picture. Please show your support by checking them out.  On behalf of Ryan, Shawn and I   :worthy:   :worthy:  In no specific order:                                                      Angler's WayGuide Service905-957-2638                            Lake Erie Bait & Tackle    Presstran Industries  Cross Bay Outdoors  KTL  Tim Hortons St. Thomas  Canadian Tire Simcoe
Thanks to all of the sponsors and all of the people who participated.   Art
Thanks to all the sponsors, and great....Amazing job, Shawn, Ryan and Dan, THE Sponsorman!!

What a great sponsor list! Those who did the marketing did a fantastic job, holy cow! I'm sorry I could not contribute this year, but I promise I'm gonna help out, somehow, next year. Its also cool to see OFC as a sponsor.
Without OFC, this may not have ever happened
WOW that is one heck of a list!  Eventhough I have yet to make it to one thank you to all the sponsors! I thought I noticed some Custom Rod's eh...
A very special thanks to all of the sponsors!!!  :thumbsup_anim:   I'll be doing my best to support them throughout the coming year.
